= Git Wiki Homepage =
Welcome to the [[Git]] wiki web site. This wiki is a community effort to provide an accurate source of information for all things related to [http://git.or.cz/ Git]. Make sure to visit the Git website for current updates and information. The Git [http://repo.or.cz/r/git-homepage.git web site source] is also managed using Git and can be [http://repo.or.cz/w/git-homepage.git viewed using gitweb]. Gitweb is included in the Git software. The maintainers of the Git website would love patches for improving the website. It's a great way to try out Git. If you come across anything in this wiki or the Git homepage that needs to be fixed; help yourself and fix it. The more people who help work on this wiki the better this site will serve Git users. Think of this site as a Wikipedia for Git. For information on editing and using this wiki visit [[UsingWiki]] page.

Git is not to be confused with at least these two unrelated projects which also provide commands named git. These should be uninstalled (or renamed) to use this git.

* [http://hulubei.net/tudor/git/ Git (GNU Interactive Tools)] is a set of browsing and viewing tools
* [http://sourceforge.net/projects/git Git (Guitar/Instrument Tuner)] is a defunct portable guitar tuner.
